verses.verse: But <S%H6258>now<s%> they that are <S%H6810>younger<s%> <S%H3117><s%> <S%H4480>than<s%> I have me in <S%H7832>derision,<s%> <S%H5921><s%> <S%H834>whose<s%> <S%H1>fathers<s%> I would have <S%H3988>disdained<s%> to have <S%H7896>set<s%> <S%H5973>with<s%> the <S%H3611>dogs<s%> of my <S%H6629>flock.<s%>
Yea, <S%H1571><s%> <S%H4100>whereto<s%> might the <S%H3581>strength<s%> of their <S%H3027>hands<s%> profit me, in <S%H5921>whom<s%> old <S%H3624>age<s%> was <S%H6>perished?<s%>

For <S%H2639>want<s%> and <S%H3720>famine<s%> they were <S%H1565>solitary;<s%> <S%H6207>fleeing<s%> into the <S%H6723>wilderness<s%> in former <S%H570>time<s%> <S%H7722>desolate<s%> and <S%H4875>waste.<s%>
Who cut <S%H6998>up<s%> <S%H4408>mallows<s%> <S%H5921>by<s%> the <S%H7880>bushes,<s%> and <S%H7574>juniper<s%> <S%H8328>roots<s%> for their <S%H3899>meat.<s%>
They were driven <S%H1644>forth<s%> <S%H4480>from<s%> <S%H1460>among<s%> men, (they <S%H7321>cried<s%> <S%H5921>after<s%> them as after a <S%H1590>thief;)<s%>
To <S%H7931>dwell<s%> in the <S%H6178>clefts<s%> of the <S%H5158>valleys,<s%> in <S%H2356>caves<s%> of the <S%H6083>earth,<s%> and in the <S%H3710>rocks.<s%>
Among <S%H996><s%> the <S%H7880>bushes<s%> they <S%H5101>brayed;<s%> <S%H8478>under<s%> the <S%H2738>nettles<s%> they were gathered <S%H5596>together.<s%>

They were <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H5036>fools,<s%> <S%H1571>yea,<s%> <S%H1121>children<s%> of base <S%H1097>men:<s%> <S%H8034><s%> they were <S%H5217>viler<s%> <S%H4480>than<s%> the <S%H776>earth.<s%>
And <S%H6258>now<s%> <S%H1961>am<s%> I their <S%H5058>song,<s%> yea, I <S%H1961>am<s%> their <S%H4405>byword.<s%>
They <S%H8581>abhor<s%> me, they flee <S%H7368>far<s%> <S%H4480>from<s%> me, and <S%H2820>spare<s%> <S%H3808>not<s%> to <S%H7536>spit<s%> in my <S%H4480>face.<s%> <S%H6440><s%>

Because <S%H3588><s%> he hath <S%H6605>loosed<s%> my <S%H3499>cord,<s%> and <S%H6031>afflicted<s%> me, they have also let <S%H7971>loose<s%> the <S%H7448>bridle<s%> <S%H4480>before<s%> <S%H6440><s%> me.

Upon <S%H5921><s%> my <S%H3225>right<s%> hand <S%H6965>rise<s%> the <S%H6526>youth;<s%> they push <S%H7971>away<s%> my <S%H7272>feet,<s%> and they raise <S%H5549>up<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> me the <S%H734>ways<s%> of their <S%H343>destruction.<s%>
They <S%H5420>mar<s%> my <S%H5410>path,<s%> they set <S%H3276>forward<s%> my <S%H1942>calamity,<s%> they have <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H5826>helper.<s%>
They <S%H857>came<s%> upon me as a <S%H7342>wide<s%> breaking <S%H6556>in<s%> of waters: <S%H8478>in<s%> the <S%H7722>desolation<s%> they rolled <S%H1556>themselves<s%> upon me.

Terrors <S%H1091><s%> are <S%H2015>turned<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> me: they <S%H7291>pursue<s%> my <S%H5082>soul<s%> as the <S%H7307>wind:<s%> and my <S%H3444>welfare<s%> passeth <S%H5674>away<s%> as a <S%H5645>cloud.<s%>
And <S%H6258>now<s%> my <S%H5315>soul<s%> is poured <S%H8210>out<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> me; the <S%H3117>days<s%> of <S%H6040>affliction<s%> have taken hold <S%H270>upon<s%> me.
My <S%H6106>bones<s%> are <S%H5365>pierced<s%> <S%H4480>in<s%> <S%H5921><s%> me in the night <S%H3915>season:<s%> and my <S%H6207>sinews<s%> take no <S%H7901>rest.<s%> <S%H3808><s%>
By the <S%H7230>great<s%> <S%H3581>force<s%> of my disease is my <S%H3830>garment<s%> <S%H2664>changed:<s%> it bindeth me <S%H247>about<s%> as the <S%H6310>collar<s%> of my <S%H3801>coat.<s%>
He hath <S%H3384>cast<s%> me into the <S%H2563>mire,<s%> and I am <S%H4911>become<s%> like <S%H6083>dust<s%> and <S%H665>ashes.<s%>
I <S%H7768>cry<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> thee, and thou dost <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H6030>hear<s%> me: I stand <S%H5975>up,<s%> and thou <S%H995>regardest<s%> me not.
Thou art <S%H2015>become<s%> <S%H393>cruel<s%> to me: with thy <S%H6108>strong<s%> <S%H3027>hand<s%> thou opposest thyself <S%H7852>against<s%> me.
Thou liftest me <S%H5375>up<s%> <S%H413>to<s%> the <S%H7307>wind;<s%> thou causest me to <S%H7392>ride<s%> upon it, and <S%H4127>dissolvest<s%> my <S%H7738>substance.<s%>
For <S%H3588><s%> I <S%H3045>know<s%> that thou wilt <S%H7725>bring<s%> me to <S%H4194>death,<s%> and to the <S%H1004>house<s%> <S%H4150>appointed<s%> for <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H2416>living.<s%>
Howbeit <S%H389><s%> he will <S%H3808>not<s%> stretch <S%H7971>out<s%> his <S%H3027>hand<s%> to the <S%H1164>grave,<s%> <S%H518>though<s%> they <S%H7769>cry<s%> in his <S%H6365>destruction.<s%>
Did <S%H3808>not<s%> I <S%H1058>weep<s%> for him that was in <S%H7186>trouble?<s%> <S%H3117><s%> was not my <S%H5315>soul<s%> <S%H5701>grieved<s%> for the <S%H34>poor?<s%>

When <S%H3588><s%> I looked <S%H6960>for<s%> <S%H2896>good,<s%> then <S%H7451>evil<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> unto me: and when I <S%H3176>waited<s%> for <S%H216>light,<s%> there <S%H935>came<s%> <S%H652>darkness.<s%>
My <S%H4578>bowels<s%> <S%H7570>boiled,<s%> and <S%H1826>rested<s%> <S%H3808>not:<s%> the <S%H3117>days<s%> of <S%H6040>affliction<s%> <S%H6923>prevented<s%> me.
I <S%H1980>went<s%> <S%H6937>mourning<s%> <S%H3808>without<s%> the <S%H2535>sun:<s%> I stood <S%H6965>up,<s%> and I <S%H7768>cried<s%> in the <S%H6951>congregation.<s%>
I <S%H1961>am<s%> a <S%H251>brother<s%> to <S%H8577>dragons,<s%> and a <S%H7453>companion<s%> to <S%H1323>owls.<s%> <S%H3284><s%>
My <S%H5785>skin<s%> is <S%H7835>black<s%> <S%H4480>upon<s%> <S%H5921><s%> me, and my <S%H6106>bones<s%> are <S%H2787>burned<s%> <S%H4480>with<s%> <S%H2721>heat.<s%>
My <S%H3658>harp<s%> also <S%H1961>is<s%> turned to <S%H60>mourning,<s%> and my <S%H5748>organ<s%> into the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of them that <S%H1058>weep.<s%>
